Title: Merry Mayhem
Plot: Dawson and Gail invite everyone back to Capeside for Christmas, but Dawson confronts Natasha about her one-night stand; Joey's happiness with Eddie turns sour when her father expresses his disapproval; Jen spends her time consoling a dumped Grams and Audrey gets loaded.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Joshua Hall, Jennifer Badger, Tree O'Toole
